name: RuneRiders.com - IB
description: An Illusion Blue version for all HDL forums
additional_info:
4-23-11 V.1.0 Initial Release
4-24-11 V.1.1 Added the WISIWYG editor background setting
4-27-11 V.1.2 Added gradient background & removed the top image block (we know who we are - normal users will still see the RunRiders image) Also works for all HDL sponsored domains.

New... 12-12-11 V.2.0 *Major Update* Support for the new VB Forum 4.x interface that is coming for all of the HDL forums. 
12-17-11 V.2.1 Fixed the post text boxes and small changes to clean up the side menus in the gallery, media, etc.
12-24-11 V.2.2 Standardized all theme settings for all the different pages of VB 4.x (I think I found them all)
               Added new screenshots
